SEARCH

Class Settings

java.lang.Object
Settings
public class Settings extends Object
A class that manages game settings through a properties file. This class handles the storage and retrieval of various game settings including play time restrictions and total play time tracking. Settings are persisted in a 'settings.properties' file. The class provides functionality to: - Load settings from a file - Save settings to a file - Get and set play time restrictions - Get and set total play time If the settings file doesn't exist, default values will be used: - Play time restriction: Integer.MAX_VALUE (unlimited) - Total play time: 0

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Settings()
    Constructs a new Settings object and loads the settings from the settings file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Settings

      public Settings()
      Constructs a new Settings object and loads the settings from the settings file. If the settings file does not exist, default values will be used.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayTimeRestriction

      public int getPlayTimeRestriction()
      Returns the play time restriction in minutes. The play time restriction is the maximum amount of time a player can play the game. If the play time restriction is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE, the player can play the game indefinitely.
      Returns:
      the play time restriction in minutes

    • setPlayTimeRestriction

      public void setPlayTimeRestriction(int restriction)
      Sets the play time restriction in minutes. The play time restriction is the maximum amount of time a player can play the game. If the play time restriction is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE, the player can play the game indefinitely.
      Parameters:
      restriction - the play time restriction in minutes

    • getTotalPlayTime

      public int getTotalPlayTime()
      Returns the total play time in minutes. The total play time is the cumulative amount of time the player has spent playing the game.
      Returns:
      the total play time in minutes

    • setTotalPlayTime

      public void setTotalPlayTime(int totalPlayTime)
      Sets the total play time in minutes. The total play time is the cumulative amount of time the player has spent playing the game.
      Parameters:
      totalPlayTime - the total play time in minutes
